content.detailedDescription:
I was coming back from a day trip to jerusalem and going back in a bus towards the taba border in egypt which was a 4 hours trip. between the dead sea and taba border my eye/attention was taken to the right side where i saw a very dark object in the horizon above the negev mountains. it was about 7pm and it was getting darker but i had a great view of this object even if it was at a distance. the object was like a black object, no wings, no lights whatsoever, following the vehicle at a distance for about 10 minutes flying slowly above the mountains range. i told my wife about this and she looked and saw it aswell. because of the hectic and long day/long trip, the other 10-15 passengers were all nearly asleep so i kept it for myself anyway. about 10 minutes into the sighting, the object suddenly stopped above a mountain range and just stayed there hovering above these particular mountains. as our vehicle was driving away, on this isolated and quiet road, towards our destination, i fixed the object for about 5 minutes who was still above that mountain range hovering until it disapeared from view. i believe that what i saw was a ufo. i know that 99% of sightings are expainable but this is no way this was a 'human' craft. it had no wings, was travelling slowly and just stopped there !What surprised me the most was that this object had no lights whatsoever...Usually ufo sightings are always connected with bright lights and so on....This was just a very black object with no lights whatsoever. i managed to take 1 picture with my digital camera which i hope you will find with this report. i showed the picture to a friend who's been in the ufo subject for many years and he's got reasons to believe that the object is a ufo travelling at a 45 degrees angle... i have also made some enlargements of the picture, as much as i could , maybe you could do better, but it seems we're looking at a ufo...On my return home in the uk, i did some investigation about my sighting and pulled a map of israel and it seems i might have had my sighting in the negev mountains, on the main road towards taba border, parralel to the ramon crater which is one of the biggest craters in the world. i am looking forward to hearing from you shortly with your views on this sighting and i am willing to help you with your investigations if you think it is worth doing one about that particular ufo sighting. please let me know by email anyway that you received this report .
very kind regards, gui rivaud - uk - guirivaud@millionsofstars.Com
ps- i will send another report with more pictures...
content.summary: Ufo sighting over negev mountains in israel part 1

content.detailedDescription: I was out star gazing when a bright red object caught my attention. as i was looking at it, it appeared to get brighter then it would dim until completely dark. it would appear in what looked like the same exact place, no higher or lower. i started taking pictures over the next half hour. it was there for 45 minutes when i came back inside. i was using a 2 mp digital camera without flash on the following pictures. when they were uploaded the boomerang shaped object was clearly there. when i zoomed in on the photo it is obvious to me that i don't know what kind of craft that could be.
content.summary: Dark red boomerang always stationary fading in and out brightest to blackout

content.detailedDescription: I was laying face up on the backyard deck of my mother���s house. the object appeared from behind the neighbor���s house situated to the south. it traveled very fast and made no noise at all. the vehicle travel south to north. it was about the size of a b-52 at 1000 ft. altitude. if it were a jet or an airplane it would have made some sound. and if it was so high that i could hear it then it would have traveled much slower through my field of view. the hair on the back of my neck stood on end. the craft disappeared from my view when it went behind the neighbor���s house that was situated to the north. i stood up and ran around to the front house but was unable to see anything. the sighting lasted less than 10 seconds. the craft was v shaped with 5 orange lights on the bottom of the wings. 1 light was on the tip of the v and 1 light on each wing tip. there was another light midway between the two lights on each wing. there are videos recorded in arizona that show craft very similar to what i saw that night in montana.
content.summary: A v shaped craft with 5 orange lights on the bottom.

content.detailedDescription:
A mysterious white light slower than a shooting star but faster than an airplane, traveling straight across the top of the sky, up near big dipper.  seen at county road 16 near taylor drive just after 9 p.M.

i stopped the car in the middle of the road, got out and looked at it.  at first i thought i was seeing a reflection of headlights on my upper windshield.  the movement was steady, but fast.  

it was traveling north at an altitude of between 5,000 and 10,000 feet and remained illuminated for about three or four seconds.  it was not a meteor or a shooting star; it was a controlled movement ��� it went straight across the highest point in the sky and then vanished.
content.summary: Light travelling straight across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was taking out the dog, and was standing in the field next to the house looking in a northly direction it had rained most of the day but the sky was not cloudy to the north and west i look up at at the big dipper while the dog did his duty. just under the big dipper i saw a bright soild star like light moving quickly in a north westly direction it was moving in a straight line i though it mite be a satilite but then it made a cruve or dip like move and it disappeared like in to thin air.I was in wonderment i stood there for a few minutes to see if it would reappear near the star i saw it disappear closest to scaning the sky in the direction i thought it it would reappear. it didn't! this may sound crazy but, i thought at the time maybe it knew i saw it and went into seath mode or something. i went back to the house feeling odd with many strange thoughts racing thur my mind. so i just went to bed wondering. got up this morning and thought i would report it to you.
content.summary: Looking at the big dipper saw bright star-like obect moving under the dipper in a straight line north west direction obect made a cruve or dip like i wasmove & disappeared

content.detailedDescription:
On april 15th 
 
8:27 pm
 
vermilion ohio
 
clear skies wind blowing towards north
object flashed brightly 5 times
appered at super high altitude
travled down as if it looked like debri entering atmosphere
i contacted nasa and they emailed me back that no know space debri entered are area at that time the place on that date given
object as shown in video moves to the south and appears to change shape as it got closewr to the gnd
as if to look sphere like
 
 
 
video and interview with acion 19 news can be viewed at
 
 
www.Woio.Com
 
click on
 
 more video
 
 
title is 
 
 
couple spots, videotapes something weird in sky above vermillion
content.summary: On april 15th clear skies wind blowing towards north object flashed brightly 5 times

content.detailedDescription: I was backing out of my driveway, going downhill, so sky visible out dash. watched in wonder about a minute, then jumped out of car and began knocking on door for my sister to come see it. by the time she came, it was quite far off, but she did see it. it came from the se, making a circle (getting ever closer, then going away) at uniform height, just over the houses, which are on one of the highest hills in haverhill, just west of the merrimack river. it was of the "two soup bowls" type, silver in the sun, with blinking lights around the middle. it was definitely undulating. it made no sound. as soon as i saw it, i knew what i was looking at, though i was stunned to  be seeing it. after it left, instead of calling the police or a newspaper, i left in my car, and told everyone i saw on the way to my (other) sister's house to look in the sky for the ufo i'd just seen. i'm sure they thought i was crazy (unless they'd seen one). i didn't stop the car. my sister also lived on the top of a hill, and i'd been hoping we'd all see it when i got there, so i was in a hurry. i never saw it again, and i never talked to anyone else that saw it. i can tell you that i was as excited during and after the sight as i've ever been in my life. now i know that ufos really do exist!
content.summary: Typical silver disk approached in circular pattern, turning away just over the merrimac kriver. undulating; no sound; blinking lights around middle.

content.detailedDescription: My friend and i were driving on an unlighted wooded road near the ipswich river on way to hamilton from rowley after midnight, returning from work. we both spotted a large,white sphere of light coming towards the road from the left. we never heard of flying saucers or ufos at that time. at first we thought a plane was crashing. but then the light stopped just above the trees in front and to the left of the road. so we thought it was a helicopter, until we realized it made no sound. we weren't afraid, just curious, so we both got out of the car and began to walk towards it. it disappeared. i have no recollection of its zooming off, even. the following night, about a half hour later at night, my friend was returing from hamilton. at approximately the same spot, a similar (same?) sphere of light zoomed across the road in front of the car, he told me. i wasn't there that time. we told our friends and family only, not for fear of ridicule, just because it never occurred to us to call the police or the newspaper.
content.summary: Moonlike light moved towards us, then hovered over trees; suddenly disappeared when we approached it to; no sound at all. reappeared following night, same time; crossed road in front of car that time.

content.detailedDescription: Friends house, on his roof looking at sky and talking. one of my friends pointed out something in the sky. i immidiately thought it was a space ship, it didnt look like anything i have seen before. it was moving about as slow as an airplane, it made no noise, it was really high up, when it moved, it was diagonal. looked as if it had a few lights and it was really big. my heart started beating really hard and my adrenaline rose. my friends and i were scrambling for our cell phones to take a picture, i dont think it would have worked any ways because it was too faint. but we were watching it and it finally started to fade away.
content.summary: Long rectangle with barely visable lights

content.detailedDescription: Sitting in my house, looked out at the clouds and decided to take a couple of pictures of the sky since it looked like a severe storm was about to errupt.  i took two pictures and then looked at my digital camera and saw this item in them.  i took a third picture and it did not appear.  i didn't have any idea what this was but when i put pictures on my computer and enlarged them it doesn't appear to be anything i can figure out.  i didn't see this item until i looked at the pictures so i don't know where it came from or where it went.  these three pictures were taken within seconds of each other.
content.summary: Took 3 pictures and this ufo appeared in two of them

content.detailedDescription: Was ncoic of a guard shift. recieved a report from a guard on duty of lights in formation to the south of us moving towards us slowly. called up to higher headquarters. no military or civillian air traffic in area. went out side observed 10 lights slightly brighter than stars in a triangle pattern moving towards our position approx 10km south of us. they were at about 50000 feet altitude heading 030. when they reached overhead of our position they stopped and moved into a tight circular pattern. we monitored them with nvgs and infrared scopes. the ir picked up a circular or spherical shape. the nvg showed they were indeed closer than the stars and much brighter. binoculars showed a more spherical shape yet quite luminescent. they stayed in the circular pattern for 1-2 minutes before three headed at about 210 at a high rate of speed as to intercept something. the remaining 7 began patrolling the area headed in different directions for approx 5 min. after that all 7 scattered and left at a high rate of speed. that is when we lost contact. higher advised that radar in tallil never picked up anything. nobody was able to make positive id on what these objects were. 2 other soldiers did witness the event in its entirety. another soldier witnessed part of the event, but was mainly manning a radio.
content.summary: Lights moving in formations

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and was walking into my bed room and noticed a bright red light through the curtains in the sky.I first thought that it was a helicopter . but it didn't make any sound . it looked like it had passed over the house at about 50 feet in the air . i watched it it traveled about around 300 feet or so and .It looked like it landed in the field the shape went dark . so me and my nephew went out side to take a look . it was dark , but we then seen a white light .I was bigger than a football ,but shaped like one.As it moved across the field the light went off and on . after about 4 times we though we seen enough .We went in the house.I have no resone to make this up. i didn't get much sleep that night . i have know ideal what it was . to be honest i don't want to know .
content.summary: It was a bright red square shape from behind .

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend were standing in my back yard when we spotted a red sphere in the sky. i ran to get my camera, while my friend kept an eye on it. when i ran back, my friend told me it took off into the atmosphere. we waited for another 4 minutes. we then saw all three (3) spheres slowly floating in a triangular formation. the objects were red, green, and yellow. i captured a still photo of the yellow sphere. the picture is enclosed.
content.summary: Bright colored spheres (yellow, green, red) sighted, and departed very fast...

content.detailedDescription:
I had just returned home from work, at or about midnight, i pulled into the driveway and turned to look up into the sky, i saw a very bright star shaking and shiimmering very far and high, i had to turn away from the house to see it.
i wondered what kind of star was so very bright and what was making it shake so, as i took a step to go into the house i turned again and it was in line with way i was turned... i stayed and starred and talked to it... like what are you? what is it you are wanting? what can i do to help you? are you a ufo?.... after a few minutes i said to the what-ever.. well, i can't stay out here all night, i am going into the house, so long... and right before my eyes the bright shimmering star like object (it was way, way up into the heavens) just drew back like it was being sucked into a straw and went up into an area that had basicaly no visible stars present.. i said wow and said good night and went into the house and got ready for bed and went back out and it was still there, so i went to bed.
content.summary: I looked up into the sky and saw a star shimmering/ shaking, very bright with-in a minute it was above me

content.detailedDescription: I was driving along royal lane, approximately 1.5 miles east of interstate 35e in the dallas texas area when i noticed an object slow to a stop above a residential area -- at my 11 o'clock position. at first, i thought this object was a police helicopter, but as i approached i could make out a arrow headed object with a thin tail. it is overcast tonight which helped, as the dull-grayish clouds help accent the black profile of the craft. it was difficult to distinguish the object's orientation, whether i was observing the bottom, side, etc, as the object was unlike anything i've seen before. it resembled the "triangular" shaped craft seen in ufo documentaries, however this craft was smaller, appearing approximately 40 ft from point to point.  the object had a slow 20-30 mph northern trajectory, as i approached it (while driving) it stopped and hovered, then moved in a southern direction as i passed under it. this is a populated, highly trafficed area.  the object was approximately 250 ft. in the air, made no sound.  as i passed under the object i lost site of it. also noteable were three bright lights in tight triangle formation towards the front of the arrowhead, with dimmer white blinking lights at each tip of the arrowhead and tail structure.
content.summary: Triangular shaped "arrow head with a tail" object observed

content.detailedDescription: I was out at night near one of the many potato fields in my home town.  most fields are separated by lines of trees.  i was near some railroad tracks and was looking at the tree line on a nearby hill.  the sun had set and it was dark plus my eyes were acclimated to the darkness, since there are no street lights where i was.  suddenly a green, glowing object, circular in nature, hazy on the edges passed in front of me above the tree line.  the object was about the size of a dime held at arms length.  it moved slowly and quietly across the top of the tree line and disappeared behind it.  the tree line was about a quarter mile away and i don't believe the object may have landed.  i didn't pursue it.  at the time of the sighting, i was 21 years old and had been in the united states air force for 3 years.  i was familiar with aircraft lights so i know for certain that this was no airplane or helicopter.  it moved too slow to have been a meteorite either.  my thoughts at the time were those of excitement and fear.  i believe that we have been and are being visited by other life from the cosmos.  i had never had an experience like this and haven't since.
content.summary: Circular, green, glowing object , size of a dime at arms length.  disappeared over tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
1.  i was in our office on the seventh floor of the gpm north building, at 800 nw loop 410, san antonio, texas, looking out the south facing windows.  i was working on a report with another office colleague.  it was the afternoon, afterworking hours, probably about 6:30pm, as most other people were already gone from the office.

2.  i first noticed the object, it seemed to be moving slowly, or drifting, and because it seemed to have some winglike projections that made me think it might have been a biplane, but moving like a helicopter, being somewhat unusual, i started watching it.

3.  a biplane.

4.  the object appeared to be dark, or black, roughly or irregularly blocklike in shape with some short appendages like wings which enlarged or disappeared, which seemed to indicate some rotation. you could not tell any surface detail, though in evening sun.  it was my impression that it was sized similar to a light plane, and maybe a mile away when first seen, but those are guesses.  when first seen, it was only at about a 20-30 degree elevation of view from our seventh floor level, so it seemed that maybe it might have only been up at an altitude of 500 or a thousand feet.  it also seemed to cycle irregularly at times slightly larger then slightly smaller in size, which seemed to indicate that it might have been moving in a spiralling pattern as it drifted further away.  it was not round, like a balloon would have been, or upside down teardrop shaped, like a weather balloon.

5.  two of us watched the object drift away.  we both agreed that we could not identify it as either a plane or helicopter, as it was moving too slow to be a winged aircraft and had no profiles or shapes on the topside where the rotor of a copter would have been.  we agreed that we could not twll what it was.  we made no report to anyone, nor noticed any in the local papers the next day.  

6.  the object seemed to stay at a constant altitude, and drift slowly southward.  it stayed visible quite awhile as a dark, diminishing dot, before it disappeared in the distance, still to the south.  i did afterward notice that a frontal system had blown in, and there was a very strong north wind blowing, in the direction the object was drifting.  there might be a possiblility of it being some odd inflatable shape being blown in the wind, however, it seemed to be moving slower than the wind was blowing and that would not explain the apparent motions.
content.summary: A dark oscillating object, roughly rectangular with projecting appendages, was observed drifting slowly southward over the city.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in mybed listening to music and looking out my window when i saw an extremly bright ilght mvoing across the sky. when i first saw it i thought i was plane but it was shaped like a t with a saucer in the middle of it. it also had to big lights on the front at 10 27 the first one flew in  southern direction as it was leaving, a second object that looked the same and flew at the same rather fast speed criscrosed it and flew in a eastern direction. as it flew through the clouds it iluminated the clouds very brightly and kept going, then it left. aruond 11.00 a third one flew by. i atached a drawing of what it looked like. thought there really crappy becasue they were odn e on ms paint. i would really apreciate if you could look into this i have no idea what that coulda been btu it certainl wasnt earthly.
content.summary: 2 "t" shaped objects were seen flying through the sky. they we moving extremly fast and were very bright.

content.detailedDescription: I was taking some sky snapshots in the field next to my house and caught this disk shape object in one of the pictures. at the time i decided not to report it(4/8/06) but now about three weeks later i have changed my mind. in the original there is a tree limb in one corner of the picture which will give you some idea at what angle the camer was pointed in an upward direction. it was also in a roughly nw direction also. i am enclosing the original and an enlargement.
content.summary: Picture taken of disk in sky

content.detailedDescription:
i was walking home from a baseball game.I was walking across a well lit parking lot.I noticed a creature in the parking lot.I stoped to look at the creature.It did not notice me at frist but when it did it looked up at my face.I can not remember what the creature looked like other then it was small.I can not remember if it had a tail or walked on four legs or had a tail.Hard as i i try i get a blank when i try to remember what it looked like.I do remember i got the impression it had intelligence.Not on the level of a smart dog but greater.
  when the creature noticed me it ran under a car.I put myself at a angal so if it left the car i could see it from all sides.I stood there from 15 to 20 mintues.A man came out of a buliding,got in the car and drove off.The creature was not there.
  when i try to remember what the creature looked like i get the impression of a monkey for some reason.This was not a monkey.I was not scared when this happened-just curious.The creature did not threaten me in any way.
  it puzzles me as to where the creature went and what it was.
  i love animals and have been to many zoos.This creature was not like anything i have seen before.
content.summary: A creature

content.detailedDescription: On september 1, 2005, a friend of mine and i were taking a joy ride on a motor boat rented from the nearby chain o'lakes state park in northern illinois in the afternoon. the weather was perfect and we took lots of pictures. we didn't observe anything unusual then, but while reviewing those pictures a couple of days ago, we got puzzled by two dark spots on one of them. after magnifying those spots, we were struck by their unusual shapes. if those were man made and placed there that time, we would have noticed them and probably phothographed at a much closer range. attached find the original, unaltered digital photo, along with two spots that we magnified for better viewing. you be the judge.
content.summary: Ufos discovered on a picture taken over grass lake

content.detailedDescription:
1). sighting occured at approximately 5:40pm on april 24, 2006 & lasted approximately 5-6 minutes. at the time of my observation of the ufo, i was sitting out in front of the loading area of my place of employment during my lunch break (i work for the home depot). 

2). sometimes during my lunch break, i will sit in this area, look southwards and watch the airplanes fly by. the las vegas airport (mccarran international) is located about 3 miles south-east of where i work. as i was watching the passenger planes fly by one after another from the airport heading westward, i happened to notice on one of the planes, what i thought at first was a piece of something - perhaps a piece of wing, fly up and begin to descend downward slowly under the plane. however, the plane kept flying onward so i immediately realized that nothing was wrong with the plane. whatever this was, i would have to say that it must have been a safe distance from the plane as i would assume the pilot would have taken measures to steer away from it if it was too close. but for a split second i thought it was a part of the plane and that something fell off.

3). after i realized that the plane was fine and wasn't going to crash, i then concentrated on observing this strange behaving object. i don't consider myself an expert on judging what the object could have been, but i can certainly tell you what is was not. i was deffinately not a plane, helicopter, bird, blimp, balloon, a kite or a piece of debri just randomly floating around in the sky. some other type of aircraft that i'm not familiar with? possibly. but i never seen anything behave in the manner in which this thing behaved.

4). where i was sitting - the roar of the planes gaining altitude can be clearly heard. however, this object was completely silent - at least i couldn't hear anything from where i was sitting. it is difficult to describe what the object looked like or its' size as it was too far away. my best guess was that it was round, flat and deffinately dark on one side and very highly reflective on the other. the best way i can describe its' movements was like that of a top rolling around on the floor as it loses momentum and falls down and moves about really fast. the wobble of this object was very fast and the flash of the reflective side was quite quick. oddly, as the plane moved forward heading west, the object very slowly descended downward - i'm guessing 1,000 feet - i could be way off on that guess??? then, it began to move toward the southeast in a everso slight downward manner until it leveled off and disappeared behind the horizon and buildings in the distance. all this time it is wobbling rapidly and continuing to reflect the suns light. i'd like to mention that it was partially cloudy that day. the planes flying by were at a too low of altitude to be as high as the clouds as they just recently departed from the airport. my guess is that the object was obviously much higher than the planes and much further away then the path of the planes. though at first the object appeared to be just a small piece of the plane, i would have to say that it would have had to be a much larger object than what would to first appear.

5). i kept my eyes fixed on this object and watched it like a hawk. i briefly looked about to notice customers going in and out of the store carrying on their business and shopping duties. i just looked around briefly to see if anybody else was looking up in the sky but i didn't notice anybody looking. i didn't want to leave and i intended to watch this thing for as long as i could. the only emotion i experienced was extreme curiousity. i just kept saying to myself, "this is wierd". 

6). the horizon of the buildings off in the distance is where the object disappeared from my viewpoint.

before reporting this to mufon, last night i turned on the local newscast to see if anybody else reported this - i heard nothing. so here i am reporting this and hoping that i'm not making a fool out of myself doing so. i told only my roommate about it. incidentally, i have an extreme interest in ufo's and i am quite familiar with dr. steven greer's disclousre project. whether this is something with a more down-to-earth explanation or something of non-earth-based orgins is of extreme interest to me. somebody else in las vegas - a major city must have seen this. i'm guessing that if it's something that is easily explainable, then that's why nobody else mentioned anything.

if mufon chooses to contact me, please do so on my cell phone number. i will return your call a.S.A.P. if i'm not immediately available. if mufon does decide to investigate this sighting, i would be extremely interested in finding out what your discover if anything. i do not have any photos of this object whatsoever. hopefully, somebody out there does and maybe come forward.
content.summary: Observed ufo about 2 - 3 miles from my location, during my lunch hour at work.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home sitting in my chair watching t.V.,i have a big window by my chair and i noticed something like a bright star,but it is alot closer! so i walked out to the end of my drive-way with my binoculars and observe it for awhile. it has different colors, blue red yellow green. and on top of it.It looks like flams shooting up-ward,like a rainbow above it! and it stays in one spot for awhile than it moves from side to side,and up and down.I was in the air force for 8 yrs and i never seen any plain do that! or any stars!I live on a dead-end road out in the boo-nies so i dont have any town or city lights to interfear with what i and my wife saw!I wish i would have a telescope with a built in camera so i could get some real good pictures of it.This aint the first time we spotted this thing, my wife and i and our neighbors spoted this object before,but their was two other ones with it!I have called 911 and reported this before but they didnt even send any buddy out to check it out.Which didnt suprise me any.Kind of like mayberry.
content.summary: Bright , different colors at times , kind of egg or oval shape , stays in one spot like a star than moves up and down and side to side weird !!

content.detailedDescription:
1.Laying on the beach
2.A shot against the sky
3.I thought it was a shooting star but it couldn't be... unless a shooting star can go to the right then jerk to the left..
4.  it was a circle shape that appered for 6 seconds... it took 3 seconds when it went to the right... i thought it was a star... i kept looking at the sky.  all of a sudden the same object shot to the left.
5. i couldn't believe my eyes.. after the first sighting i blinked... then saw it again..
6.  the object when jerked to the right had a bright yellowish light... when it wen tto the right it dissapered... then when it went to the right hte samething.. it disapered into the night sky.
content.summary: Laying on the beach... saw a cirlculer object in the sky... i saw it jerk to the right... then went even faster to the left

content.detailedDescription:
I was in the hot tub, which is where i am every night between 10:30 and 11:30 or so.  i do not drink alcohol. watching the sky looking for shooting stars or satellites.  saw what i first thought was a satellite moving from north to southeast, but then noticed there was another bright object behind it moving in unison.  watched for approximately two minutes when they both dissappeared.  they were white in color, and did not appear again.  i stayed out and looked for them for approximately 15 more minutes, searching the sky for any movement.  other than high flying planes, i saw nothing else.
this appeared very odd to me.  i have been living in this location for four years, and spend 5 of 7 nights in the hot tub before i go to bed.  i am very used to looking at the night sky, but don't know the constellations well.  i know what satellites look light when they pass over, and as i said, i first thought this is what i thought it was, until i saw the second light.  these looked like they were coming off the tail of the little (or big) dipper.  there were no clouds...Sky was totally clear.  they got close to a very bright star (planet?) at about 2 o'clock facing east, and just disappeared.
content.summary: Two star-like objects in formation, 12 o'clock high, then dissappear

content.detailedDescription: A fire truck passed my house, and i looked out the window.  a quick glance up at the clouds, i saw a glowing object, gliding across the tops of the clouds, but bright enough to shine through.  it lasted about 20 seconds and it was gone.  couldn't of been lightning.  looked like a craft of some kind.
content.summary: Glowing object above the clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was pointing the hair dryer at cars to see if they slowed down and it just hovered there
content.summary: It was like a blimp shaped flaming thing and it was just hovering there watching me

content.detailedDescription: I was at home in my room watching tv a green light flew past my bedroom window i sat up see what it was it disappeared as i sat up then when i looked out my window there was no noise or light outside
content.summary: A green light flew past my window

content.detailedDescription:
04/20/06  7:43 pm :  heading south down 347 from chandler, past riggs road, down towards the ak-chin indian reservation, spotted 4 (or 5) large, stationary equidistant amber orbs in a zigzag pattern.  they were almost directly over the road (or, if further out than they appeared, over the sonoran desert natl. monument), though how far in the distance and at what altitude i don���t know.  twilight had almost completely faded.  they were not there more than 10-15 seconds before all the orbs disappeared at the exact same time as though someone had quickly turned down a dimmer switch to ���off���.  
less than ten minutes later another set of lights - same color but elongated in shape and more tightly grouped/farther off - appeared in succession, this time to the southwest of 347, then quickly disappeared in the same order they appeared.  each would come on and soon fade out as its neighbor within the cluster followed suite.  we followed 347 and then 84 west to the i8 and headed south then east, seeing them further away to the sw yet again on two more occasions for no more than 6 seconds at a time, probably over the barry m. goldwater range at this point.  we turned south down stanfield rd., eventually heading into tohono indian reservation (and seeing another quick, stationary-yet fade-in/fade-out series of amber lights directly in front of us, to the south) before turning around.  as we headed back north, the series appeared again (around 8:30pm), this time to our south west, perhaps back over the goldwater range.  these were even further out, and as they faded, they seemed to become flickering white lights, far in the distance, apparently unmoving, coming and going from sight.  we had stopped the car, and could hear no jet noises at all, close or in the distance, and the air was calm.  when nothing more happened we headed back north to the 8 and east to the i10 for phoenix.
 while the last sets of flicking white lights may or may not have been flares, i cannot be certain either way, as they were so far off.  however the first set of equidistant orbs were like nothing i have ever seen in the sky before, and the succeeding groups were almost equally large and strange, instantly striking my wife and i each time as odd.
twice, 20 minutes apart, we saw what appeared to be shootings stars cross through the general vicinity of where the lights had just been.  in any case, the events were fascinating, strange, and unmistakably ���different.���
content.summary: 4 - 5 large, bright amber orbs appear equidistant from each other over 347

content.detailedDescription:
I arrived at my home in pasadena, ca about 8:45 pm. i entered the dark house and started closing my blinds which i had left open in this morning for the plants to get sun. as i was closing the blinds in one window i notice a bright orange light just above the east, north east horizon. i was unable to tell how far away it was though. atleast a couple miles. it's brightness captured my attention. as i know there is an airline path in that direction i waited and watched to see if it would turn, as usual, exposing it's navigation lights. the object did not seem to move. after about 30-45 seconds it moved slightly and the intensity of the light brightened to about a magnitude -3; quite large for what is usually in the sky. it was varying in color from red, orange, dark yellow, and white, similar to a bright flickering, scintillating star on a cold windy night but several times brighter and more orange. after a minute or so and moving a very short distance to the north east, approximately six tiny moving objects came around it over the top and some at the bottom. these were a golden-orange in color, steadly lighted but moved so freely in any direction. they were about a magnatude 2 or 3. it hit me like a ton of bricks! i knew exactly what i was seeing! i had a feeling of another reality as if i was seeing a ghost or some rare or forbidden sight. because i've seen this before about ten years ago, i dropped everything and ran for my video camera. as i got outside the scintillation had stopped and the satallite crafts had disappeared. i did capture video of this eire bright orange object, down to a -1 to a 0 magnatude object, start moving south, behind and then out again from the trees. it's movement was steady but somehow it had an odd charactar about itself. it just didn't seem usual. it than was hard south when it went behind a building. i went down to the end of my street to capture more video but it was gone.

unfortunately, at the moment i do not have the technology to upload a video from a camcorder but i will forward it accordingly when i am able.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: 1st apprd at -3 magnitude, brilliant array of scintillating red, orange, dk yellow, surrounded by satallite crafts
